data.eml:eml: New euophryine jumping spiders from the Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Jun-Xia, Maddison, Wayne P. (2012): New euophryine jumping spiders from the Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryinae). Zootaxa 3476: 1-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282237
